Source.Name: endless-sky
Source.Summary: Endless Sky is a sandbox-style space exploration game similar to Elite, Escape Velocity, or Star Control
Source.Description: Explore other star systems. Earn money by trading, carrying passengers, or completing missions. Use your earnings to buy a better ship or to upgrade the weapons and engines on your current one. Blow up pirates. Take sides in a civil war. Or leave human space behind and hope to find some friendly aliens whose culture is more civilized than your own...
